item.title: Color-Oriented Redundancy Reduction in Dataset Distillation
item.description: AutoPalette: a new framework minimizing color redundancy in dataset distillation, resulting in more efficient model training with comparable performance.

item.title: DiPEx: Dispersing Prompt Expansion for Class-Agnostic Object Detection
item.description: DiPEx: a novel self-supervised prompt expansion method dramatically boosts class-agnostic object detection by progressively learning non-overlapping hyperspherical prompts, surpassing existing methods…
